# SRElectrocardiogramSession.SessionGuidance.guided

**Case**

The system coaches the user to guide the ECG readings.

## Declaration

```swift
case guided
```

## Discussion

The duration of this type of session is usually fixed.

## Types

- **SRElectrocardiogramSession.SessionGuidance.unguided**: The system doesn’t coach the user to guide the ECG readings.

items.description: The system doesn’t coach the user to guide the ECG readings.
